message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I believe I can find similar products at a lower price elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for this product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a fair price.  While there may be similar products out there, this one has unique features and benefits you won't find elsewhere. I could come down to $15,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. However, I still believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $14,000 for this product.
